name: A View of the Bay of Naples, Looking Southwest from the Pizzofalcone towards Capo di Posilippo
description: A View of the Bay of Naples, Looking Southwest from the Pizzofalcone towards Capo di Posilippo; Giovanni Battista Lusieri (Italian, about 1755 - 1821); Naples, Italy; 1791; Watercolor, gouache, graphite, and pen and ink on six sheets of paper; 101.8 × 271.9 cm (40 1/16 × 107 1/16 in.); 85.GC.281; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: A View of the Bay of Naples, Looking Southwest from the Pizzofalcone towards Capo di Posilippo
